script

tests.text: You should set the src attribute of your img element to ${image}.
You should set the alt attribute of your img element to ${author} avatar.

description: Now create an image tag and give it the class user-img. Use template interpolation to set the src attribute to image you destructured earlier. Set the alt attribute to author followed by the text avatar. Make sure there is a space between the author variable and the word avatar, for example, Quincy Larson avatar.
